abstract: Pres Obama will begin series of executive-branch actions to confront housing, education and other economic problems in what amounts to tacit admission that his jobs plan will not pass Congress.
snippet: In a tacit admission that Congress is not going to cooperate on his jobs plan, President Obama is turning to less sweeping measures.
lead_paragraph: In a tacit admission that Congress is not going to cooperate on his jobs plan, President Obama is turning to less sweeping measures.

headline.main: Jobs Plan Stalled, Obama to Try New Economic Drive
headline.print_headline: Jobs Plan Stalled, Obama to Try New Economic Drive
headline.seo: Jobs Plan Stalled, Obama to Try New Economic Drive
